version.doc: Configuration specification version number. Must be 1.

name.doc: A human-readable name for the configuration.

metadata.doc: Arbitrary properties useful to track with the configuration. Properties should be prefixed to avoid collisions, like 'mapbox:'.

gestures.doc: Gesture configuration allows to control the user touch interaction.

resources.doc: Resources configuration allows to control how resource are handled.

map.doc: Map configuration allows to control how a map is created.

location_component.doc: Shows a location puck on the map.

logo.doc: Shows the Mapbox logo on the map.

scale_bar.doc: Shows the scale bar on the map.

attribution.doc: Shows the attribution icon on the map.

compass.doc: Shows the compass on the map.

metadata.doc: Arbitrary properties useful to track with the options, but do not influence rendering. Properties should be prefixed to avoid collisions, like 'mapbox:'.

rotate-enabled.doc: Whether the rotate gesture is enabled.

pinch-to-zoom-enabled.doc: Whether the pinch to zoom gesture is enabled.

pan-enabled.doc: Whether the single-touch pan gesture is enabled.

scroll-enabled.doc: Whether the single-touch scroll gesture is enabled.

pinch-enabled.doc: Whether the pinch gesture is enabled. Allows panning, rotating, and zooming.

pinch-rotate-enabled.doc: Whether rotation is enabled for the pinch gesture.

simultaneous-rotate-and-pinch-to-zoom-en.doc: Whether rotation is enabled for the pinch to zoom gesture.

pitch-enabled.doc: Whether the pitch gesture is enabled.

horizontal.doc: The map may only move horizontally.

vertical.doc: The map may only move vertically.

horizontal-and-vertical.doc: The map may move both horizontally and vertically.

pan-mode.doc: Configures the directions in which the map is allowed to move during a pan gesture.

horizontal.doc: The map may only move horizontally.

vertical.doc: The map may only move vertically.

horizontal-and-vertical.doc: The map may move both horizontally and vertically.

scroll-mode.doc: Configures the directions in which the map is allowed to move during a scroll gesture.

pan-deceleration-factor.doc: A constant factor that determines how quickly pan deceleration animations happen. Multiplied with the velocity vector once per millisecond during deceleration animations.

double-tap-to-zoom-in-enabled.doc: Whether double tapping the map with one touch results in a zoom-in animation.

double-touch-to-zoom-out-enabled.doc: Whether single tapping the map with two touches results in a zoom-out animation.

quick-zoom-enabled.doc: Whether the quick zoom gesture is enabled.

focal-point.doc: By default, gestures rotate and zoom around the center of the gesture. Set this property to rotate and zoom around a fixed point instead.

pinch-to-zoom-deceleration-enabled.doc: Whether a deceleration animation following a pinch-to-zoom gesture is enabled. True by default.

rotate-deceleration-enabled.doc: Whether a deceleration animation following a rotate gesture is enabled. True by default.

scroll-deceleration-enabled.doc: Whether a deceleration animation following a scroll gesture is enabled. True by default.

increase-rotate-threshold-when-pinching-.doc: Whether rotate threshold increases when pinching to zoom. true by default.

increase-pinch-to-zoom-threshold-when-ro.doc: Whether pinch to zoom threshold increases when rotating. true by default.

zoom-animation-amount.doc: The amount by which the zoom level increases or decreases during a double-tap-to-zoom-in or double-touch-to-zoom-out gesture. 1.0 by default. Must be positive.

pinch-pan-enabled.doc: Whether pan is enabled for the pinch gesture.

access-token.doc: A JSON Web token to associate API requests with your Mapbox account.

base-url.doc: An URL that defines the base for API requests.

static.doc: A once-off still image of an arbitrary viewport.

tile.doc: A once-off still image of a single tile.

map-mode.doc: The map rendering mode. By default, it is set to Continuous so the map will render as data arrives from the network and react immediately to state changes.

unique.doc: Unique context mode: in OpenGL, the GL context is not shared, thus we can retain knowledge about the GL state from a previous render pass. It also enables clearing the screen using glClear for the bottommost background layer when no pattern is applied to that layer.

shared.doc: Shared context mode: in OpenGL, the GL context is shared with other renderers, thus we cannot rely on the GL state set from a previous render pass.

tile.doc: A once-off still image of a single tile.

context-mode.doc: The map context mode. This can be used to optimizations if we know that the drawing context is not shared with other code.

width-and-height.doc: Constrain both width and height axes.

constrain-mode.doc: The map constrain mode. This can be used to limit the map to wrap around the globe horizontally. By default, it is set to HeightOnly.

viewport-mode.doc: The viewport mode. This can be used to flip the vertical orientation of the map as some devices may use inverted orientation.

orientation.doc: The orientation of the Map. By default, it is set to upwards.

cross-source-collisions.doc: To enable cross-source symbol collision detection or not. By default, it is set to true.

size.doc: The size to resize the map object and renderer backend. The size is given in logical pixels.

pixel-ratio.doc: The custom pixel ratio. By default, it is set to 1.

font-family.doc: Font family to use as font fallback for client-side text renderings.

no-glyphs-rasterized-locally.doc: No glyphs are rasterized locally. All glyphs are loaded from the server.

ideographs-rasterized-locally.doc: Ideographs are rasterized locally, and they are not loaded from the server.

all-glyphs-rasterized-locally.doc: All glyphs are rasterized locally. No glyphs are loaded from the server.

surface-view.doc: Default, map rendering on a GLSurfaceView.

surface.doc: The view type used to render.

enabled.doc: Whether the user location is visible on the map.

pulsing-enabled.doc: Whether the location puck is pulsing on the map. Works for 2D location puck only.

pulsing-color.doc: The color of the pulsing circle. Works for 2D location puck only.

pulsing-max-radius.doc: The maximum radius of the pulsing circle. Works for 2D location puck only.

show-accuracy-ring.doc: Whether show accuracy ring with location puck. Works for 2D location puck only.

accuracy-ring-color.doc: The color of the accuracy ring. Works for 2D location puck only.

accuracy-ring-border-color.doc: The color of the accuracy ring border. Works for 2D location puck only.

layer-above.doc: Sets the id of the layer that's added above to when placing the component on the map.

layer-below.doc: Sets the id of the layer that's added below to when placing the component on the map.

puck-bearing-enabled.doc: Whether the puck rotates to track the bearing source.

heading.doc: Orients the puck to match the direction in which the device is facing.

course.doc: Orients the puck to match the direction in which the device is moving.

puck-bearing-source.doc: The enum controls how the puck is oriented

top-image.doc: Name of image in sprite to use as the top of the location indicator.

bearing-image.doc: Name of image in sprite to use as the middle of the location indicator.

shadow-image.doc: Name of image in sprite to use as the background of the location indicator.

scale-expression.doc: The scale expression of the images. If defined, it will be applied to all the three images.

model-uri.doc: An URL for the model file in gltf format.

model-scale-expression.doc: The scale expression of the model, which will overwrite the default scale expression that keeps the model size constant during zoom.

model-translation.doc: The translation of the model [lon, lat, z]

location-puck.doc: Defines what the customised look of the location puck.

enabled.doc: Whether the scale is visible on the map.

top-left.doc: The top left position of the map.

top-center.doc: The top center position of the map.

top-right.doc: The top right position of the map.

center-right.doc: The center right position of the map.

bottom-right.doc: The bottom right position of the map.

bottom-center.doc: The bottom center position of the map.

bottom-left.doc: The bottom left position of the map.

center-left.doc: The center left position of the map.

position.doc: Defines where the scale bar is positioned on the map

margin-left.doc: Defines the margin to the left that the scale bar honors.

margin-top.doc: Defines the margin to the top that the scale bar honors.

margin-right.doc: Defines the margin to the right that the scale bar honors.

margin-bottom.doc: Defines the margin to the bottom that the scale bar honors.

text-color.doc: Defines text color of the scale bar.

primary-color.doc: Defines primary color of the scale bar.

secondary-color.doc: Defines secondary color of the scale bar.

border-width.doc: Defines width of the border for the scale bar.

height.doc: Defines height of the scale bar.

text-bar-margin.doc: Defines margin of the text bar of the scale bar.

text-border-width.doc: Defines text border width of the scale bar.

text-size.doc: Defines text size of the scale bar.

is-metric-units.doc: Whether the scale bar is using metric unit. True if the scale bar is using metric system, false if the scale bar is using imperial units.

refresh-interval.doc: Configures minimum refresh interval, in millisecond, default is 15.

show-text-border.doc: Configures whether to show the text border or not, default is true.

ratio.doc: configures ratio of scale bar max width compared with MapView width, default is 0.5.

useContinuousRendering.doc: If set to True scale bar will be triggering onDraw depending on [ScaleBarSettings.refreshInterval] even if actual data did not change. If set to False scale bar will redraw only on demand. Defaults to False and should not be changed explicitly in most cases. Could be set to True to produce correct GPU frame metrics when running gfxinfo command.

enabled.doc: Whether the compass is visible on the map.

top-left.doc: The top left position of the map.

top-center.doc: The top center position of the map.

top-right.doc: The top right position of the map.

center-right.doc: The center right position of the map.

bottom-right.doc: The bottom right position of the map.

bottom-center.doc: The bottom center position of the map.

bottom-left.doc: The bottom left position of the map.

center-left.doc: The center left position of the map.

position.doc: Defines where the compass is positioned on the map

margin-left.doc: Defines the margin to the left that the compass icon honors.

margin-top.doc: Defines the margin to the top that the compass icon honors.

margin-right.doc: Defines the margin to the right that the compass icon honors.

margin-bottom.doc: Defines the margin to the bottom that the compass icon honors.

opacity.doc: The alpha channel value of the compass image

rotation.doc: The clockwise rotation value in degrees of the compass.

fade-when-facing-north.doc: Whether the compass fades out to invisible when facing north direction.

clickable.doc: Whether the compass can be clicked and click events can be registered.

image.doc: The compass image, the visual representation of the compass.

enabled.doc: Whether the attribution icon is visible on the map.

icon-color.doc: Defines text color of the attribution icon.

top-left.doc: The top left position of the map.

top-center.doc: The top center position of the map.

top-right.doc: The top right position of the map.

center-right.doc: The center right position of the map.

bottom-right.doc: The bottom right position of the map.

bottom-center.doc: The bottom center position of the map.

bottom-left.doc: The bottom left position of the map.

center-left.doc: The center left position of the map.

position.doc: Defines where the attribution icon is positioned on the map

margin-left.doc: Defines the margin to the left that the attribution icon honors.

margin-top.doc: Defines the margin to the top that the attribution icon honors.

margin-right.doc: Defines the margin to the right that the attribution icon honors.

margin-bottom.doc: Defines the margin to the bottom that the attribution icon honors.

clickable.doc: Whether the attribution can be clicked and click events can be registered.

enabled.doc: Whether the logo is visible on the map.

top-left.doc: The top left position of the map.

top-center.doc: The top center position of the map.

top-right.doc: The top right position of the map.

center-right.doc: The center right position of the map.

bottom-right.doc: The bottom right position of the map.

bottom-center.doc: The bottom center position of the map.

bottom-left.doc: The bottom left position of the map.

center-left.doc: The center left position of the map.

position.doc: Defines where the logo is positioned on the map

margin-left.doc: Defines the margin to the left that the attribution icon honors.

margin-top.doc: Defines the margin to the top that the attribution icon honors.

margin-right.doc: Defines the margin to the right that the attribution icon honors.

margin-bottom.doc: Defines the margin to the bottom that the attribution icon honors.
